sentences.en: And bones cast in a little low dry garret.
sentences.cn: 白骨抛弃在干燥低矮的小阁楼上.

sentences.en: Colonel Garret was kind enough to show us the file on you, Marco.
sentences.cn: 盖瑞特上校给我们看了你的档案, 马可.

sentences.en: GARRET MICHEL : Sorry about that Bill and terribly listening , but there are dark clouds here though.
sentences.cn: 加内特·米歇尔: 很遗憾,比尔, 但我们听说云计算目前也是乌云密布.

sentences.en: Garret Weber - Gale and Michael Phelps display an evolutionary trait.
sentences.cn: 盖尔和菲尔普斯展示出了进化和特点.

sentences.en: He began its inspection without delay, scouring it from cellar to garret.
sentences.cn: 他马上开始把整个住宅巡视一番, 从地窖到阁楼处处都跑遍了.

sentences.en: In the very year of Garret More's death Wolsey first came into power in Engl and.
sentences.cn: 在加勒特·莫尔去世那处,首先在英国上台掌权的人物是沃尔西.

sentences.en: Jo! Jo! Where are you? cried Meg at the foot of the garret stairs.
sentences.cn: “乔! 乔! 你在哪儿? ”玫站在通往顶楼的楼梯上喊着.

sentences.en: Joe was very busy in the garret.
sentences.cn: 裘正在顶楼上忙得不亦乐乎.

sentences.en: Most people outside of Marion Lynn's hometown of Garret, Ohio, may have never heard of her.
sentences.cn: 大部分不住在玛丽安·的家乡─俄亥俄州,盖瑞镇─的人, 可能从未听说过她.

sentences.en: No doubt he lived in a garret.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,他住在一间小阁楼上.

sentences.en: Oh, I hope you'll die in a garret!
sentences.cn: 啊，我希望你死在阁楼上，活活饿死！

sentences.en: She made no stay at the stairs'-head, but mounted farther, to the garret where Heathcliff was confined, and called him.
sentences.cn: 她并没有在楼梯顶停下来，而是向更上面走去，走向关着希斯克利夫的阁楼，并叫他的名字。

sentences.en: She roamed the building from garret to cellar.
sentences.cn: 她一直从阁楼找到地窖.

sentences.en: Somebody has come looking for you , he's now waiting in the garret.
sentences.cn: 一路上多亏了同路人的帮助, 我才能平安回来.

sentences.en: The story formed by a mansard roof is usually called the garret.
sentences.cn: 由双重斜坡屋顶形成的那一层通常称为阁楼.

sentences.en: The three had risen, and their heads were together when he came back to the garret.
sentences.cn: 他回屋时那三个人已经站了起来, 三颗头攒在了一起.

sentences.en: They are the poor men living in a garret.
sentences.cn: 他们就是住在阁楼上的穷人.

trans.tran_en: a small uncomfortable room at the top of a house, just under the roof
